title: Honour the king a sermon preached on the solemn fast, January 30, 1672/3 : wherein the duty of subjects to their sovereign is opened and asserted, the principles and practices inconsistent therewith are directed and condemned, and the innocent vindicated from unjust censures : at Birmingham in Warwick shire at the publick meeting-place there licensed according to His Majesties gracious declaration / by Samuel Fisher, M.A., late preacher of the word at Thornton in Cheshire.
author: Fisher, Samuel, 1616 or 17-1681.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for George Calvert ... and Hierom Gregory, bookseller in Birmingham ...,
